section_1.title: Create your beat
section_1.paragraph_1: Tap on any input to activate it.
section_1.paragraph_2: You can offset the individual sounds by using the sliders below the circle.
section_1.paragraph_3: Once you have activated at least one input you can start the beat. Any changes made to the beat while in play mode will be heard on the next interval pass.

section_2.title: Settings
section_2.paragraph_1: In the settings screen you can change:
section_2.paragraph_2: Any changes in the settings screen will pause your beat if it is playing so that changes can be applied correctly.

section_3.title: Presets
section_3.paragraph_1: In the settings screen you can change:

subsection_1.title: Save
subsection_1.paragraph_1: Once you have a beat you can tap on a preset to save that beat. (This will save your configuration including the active inputs, the position of each slider, the BPM and the time signature)
subsection_1.paragraph_2: Once saved the preset button will change colour to indicate that it can now be loaded.

subsection_2.title: Load
subsection_2.paragraph_1: To load the preset just tap it.

subsection_3.title: Delete
subsection_3.paragraph_2: it and a window will appear asking you to confirm the action.

section_4.title: Export MIDI
section_4.paragraph_1: When selected you will be prompted with a window to name your MIDI file. (If no name is given the placeholder name
section_4.paragraph_3:
will be used)

Once named you can save it, this will open up a sharing option to transfer your file to your computer so you can use your Ritmo beat in your DAW.
section_4.paragraph_4: The exported MIDI file is a single bar (that can be looped), with a Kick (C1 - pitch), Snare (D1 - pitch) and Hi-Hat (F#1 - pitch) configuration. It has a fixed velocity, an encoded BPM and time signature if your beat is NOT in "Free time sig" mode.
section_4.paragraph_5: The MIDI file is not stored in the internal phone storage unless you save it yourself inside the share window. (This is done to minimise app space and conserve your phone's storage space)
